markdownRemark.html:
Reality do bite. It causes us to test our fragile time in this world as we cannot control everything. I truly tried my best (for the past two years) to establish myself and work by my own terms but I ultimately reached to this conclusion, I need to go back to working in the accounting and finance profession.

Reasons are simple. Financial considerations. But I am truly excited to work not because of that. I am looking forward to meet new people and experiences in other countries. I don’t see the practicality of working in Manila again because of the horrendous traffic and low salary.

I really need funds to set up some projects as well. It is very difficult to pitch people to invest in projects that are poorly established in form and credibility.

I’m looking forward to update this blog for where I’ll set-up shop..
